title: Erin Ireland was inspired to change her business
description:
In Episode #182 we hear from Erin Ireland on transitioning her business to a vegan company. This is a condensed throwback from Episode #54.

- Erin’s journey growing up in Canada and discovering her passion for food
- Starting a successful bakery business from her apartment
- What led Erin to going vegan
- Erin’s experience feeding her daughter
- The cost of vegan food
- How to go vegan
- Erin’s mission to spread the vegan message

Resources:
Episode 54 - Why Erin Ireland turned her company vegan
Connect with Erin on Instagram
Erin’s website It’s To Die For
Erin’s Vancouver Vegan Eats Recommendations
Where to get Erin’s Banana Bread 

Want to support the show?
If you are enjoying the Plant Proof podcast a great way to support the show is by leaving a review on the Apple podcast app. It only takes a few minutes and helps more people find the episodes.

It's also helpful to subscribe on Apple Podcast app and/or follow on the Spotify Podcast app.

Simon Hill, Nutritionist, Sports Physiotherapist
Creator of Plantproof.com and host of the Plant Proof Podcast
Author of The Proof is in the Plants
